exact_source: Auric Mining Limited (ASX: AWJ) (Auric or the Company) is pleased to announce that through a new wholly owned entity LMG (WA) Pty Ltd (LMG), Auric has executed a Binding Letter Agreement to purchase the Lindsay’s Project, including Parrot Feathers open pit gold mine from Top Global Mining Pty Ltd and NBC Mining Pty Ltd (The Vendors) through its corporate advisers SEER Financial Group.
